alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 1:32PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL HUMBOLDT COUNTY THROUGH 200 PM PST... At 131 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fortuna, or 11 miles northwest of Grizzly Creek Redwoods State Park, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grizzly Creek Redwoods State Park, Carlotta, Pepperwood, and Hydesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt
